details.arabic_diacless: الحمد للٰه الذي أطعمني هٰذا، ورزقنيه، من غير حول مني ولا قوة
details.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ أَطْعَمَنِيْ هٰذَا، وَرَزَقَنِيْهِ، مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِّنِّيْ وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
details.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-la<u>th</u>ee 'at'amanee haa<u>th</u>aa, wa razaqaneehi, min ghayri hawlin minnee wa laa quwwatin.
details.translations: Praise is to Allah Who has given me this food and sustained me with it though I was unable to do it and powerless.
details.bottom: Allah will forgive him for all previous sins
details.reference: At-Tirmithi, Abu Dawud, and Ibn Majah. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmithi 3/159.
